name: Pb.bank
tagline: A starter online banking application built with Worklight, Angular and Bluemix services
body:
### pb.bank starter app
A starter hybrid application built on IBM Worklight leveraging the AngularJS framework and IBM Bluemix to host backend services.

### Authors and Contributors
Paolo Bianchini (@paolob67) is a Senior Architect, Technical Leader at IBM. Check out his [linkedin profile](http://it.linkedin.com/in/paolobianchini/)

### References
* [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com)
* [UI Bootstrap](http://angular-ui.github.io/bootstrap/)


### Support or Contact
